oncologyPage.title: Advanced Cancer Treatment in Germany | CareOverseas
oncologyPage.description: Comprehensive cancer diagnostics and treatment in Germany starting from €6000. Access to top specialists and innovative therapies such as immunotherapy, CAR-T, and robotic surgery for all cancer types.
oncologyPage.subtitle: Access world-class cancer treatment in Germany. We offer complete diagnostics and advanced therapies for all types of malignancies.
oncologyPage.diagnosticsSubtitle: Our comprehensive diagnostic package starts from €6000 and includes consultations with leading oncologists, imaging, pathology review, and molecular testing. A precise cost estimate is provided after reviewing your medical records and creating a personalized treatment plan.
